printInvoice(int) - Method in class invoice.InvoiceMgr

printPack(OrderPromotionPackage) - Method in class order.Order
Prints the items in a promotion package
PromotionPackage - Class in menu
A promotion package contains two or more menu items, packaged together in a deal.
PromotionPackage(int, String, double, String, ArrayList<MenuItem>) - Constructor for class menu.PromotionPackage
This creates a promotion package, containing a list of ala carte menu items
PromotionPackageMgr - Class in menu
The control class for promotion packages This control class will manage the list of promotion packages
PromotionPackageMgr() - Constructor for class menu.PromotionPackageMgr
When instantiating this control, it will create a list of promotion packages, as well as instantiate a promotionPackageUI for UI displays
PromotionPackageUI - Class in menu
The UI class used for the promotion package control class Displays pertaining to UI are called from this class
PromotionPackageUI() - Constructor for class menu.PromotionPackageUI
constructing the UI class does not require any special parameters
